House Contract in Austria ‚Äì Wohnrechtsvereinbarung üè†üá¶üáπ

Published: Mar 19, 2025 |  at  11:00 AM
| Suggest Changes

If you are renting or staying in an apartment in Austria, Wohnrechtsvereinbarung (Right of Residence Agreement) is a legal contract that confirms your residential rights. This document is essential for visa renewal, university registration, and financial applications.

üîó Download the Sample Contract: House Contract (Wohnrechtsvereinbarung)

‚úÖ What is a Wohnrechtsvereinbarung?

‚úîÔ∏è A contract between the landlord/tenant (Accommodation Provider) and the resident (Tenant).
‚úîÔ∏è Confirms that the resident has legal rights to stay at a specific address.
‚úîÔ∏è Required for visa extensions, Meldezettel (address registration), university admissions, and financial purposes.

üìå Key Sections of the Contract

1Ô∏è‚É£ Personal Information of Both Parties

  • Accommodation Provider (UnterkunftgeberIn)
    ‚úîÔ∏è Full Name
    ‚úîÔ∏è Date of Birth
    ‚úîÔ∏è Address
    ‚úîÔ∏è Contact Information

  • Resident (UnterkunftnehmerIn)
    ‚úîÔ∏è Full Name
    ‚úîÔ∏è Date of Birth
    ‚úîÔ∏è Address
    ‚úîÔ∏è Nationality

2Ô∏è‚É£ Address of Residence

‚úîÔ∏è Full address (Street, House Number, Staircase, Floor, Door Number).
‚úîÔ∏è Must match the address on the Meldezettel (address registration document).

3Ô∏è‚É£ Duration of the Agreement

‚úîÔ∏è Start Date (Von) and End Date (Bis) of the stay.
‚úîÔ∏è The contract cannot be canceled at any time, but only with a one-month notice period.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Details of the Accommodation

‚úîÔ∏è Size of the apartment (in square meters).
‚úîÔ∏è Number of rooms in the residence.
‚úîÔ∏è List of all residents (if sharing).

5Ô∏è‚É£ Cost of Accommodation

‚úîÔ∏è Monthly Rent Amount (‚Ç¨) (if applicable).
‚úîÔ∏è ‚ÄúUnentgeltlich‚Äù (Free Stay) ‚Äì If no rent is charged.
‚úîÔ∏è The landlord must attach a copy of the rental contract or property ownership documents.

6Ô∏è‚É£ Signatures & Official Approval

‚úîÔ∏è Both the Accommodation Provider & Resident must sign the contract.
‚úîÔ∏è Date & location must be included in the contract.
‚úîÔ∏è A copy of the rental agreement or property ownership proof must be attached.

üìå Why is Wohnrechtsvereinbarung Important?

PurposeRequirement
Visa RenewalMust submit a valid Wohnrechtsvereinbarung as proof of accommodation.
University EnrollmentRequired by some universities for permanent accommodation proof.
Tax & Finance ApplicationsNeeded for registering a bank account, FinanzOnline, or tax-related matters.
Police Registration (Meldezettel)Confirms your official residence in Austria.

üìç Where to Submit Wohnrechtsvereinbarung?

‚úîÔ∏è For Visa Applications: Submit to MA35 (Immigration Office).
‚úîÔ∏è For Meldezettel Registration: Submit at your local Magistrat (City Office).
‚úîÔ∏è For Employer or Financial Use: Provide a copy when opening a bank account or registering for FinanzOnline.

üìû MA35 Contact:
üìç Address: Dresdnerstra√üe 93, 1200 Wien
üìß Email: post@ma35.wien.gv.at
üåê Website: MA35 Immigration Office

‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notes

‚úîÔ∏è Keep a copy of the signed contract for your records.
‚úîÔ∏è If you are staying without a rental contract, ensure your Wohnrechtsvereinbarung states ‚ÄúUnentgeltlich‚Äù (Free Accommodation).
‚úîÔ∏è The accommodation provider must be the legal tenant or owner of the residence.

üì¢ Need Help?

If you have any questions about Wohnrechtsvereinbarung or your accommodation rights:
üìû MA35 Support: +43 1 4000 3535
üìç Visit the Magistrat Office for Meldezettel registration.

üéâ Now You Know Everything About House Contracts in Austria!
Make sure you have a valid Wohnrechtsvereinbarung before applying for any legal or financial services! üöÄ
